lyrics.text: You know ! That i know someone ( a girl ) who didn't got any sweet word from her lover
Do you know that I know a girl who haven't spent with her lover any good moment
He haven't told her " I love you " .. and didn't call her " my sweetheart"
Why is she patient with him ? and why is she sacrificiing for him ?
Do you know who is it ? It 's me
Is there anyone who loves someone else and hurt him like this ?
Is there anybody who prefer sacrifice his life for his lover ?
Is there anyone who has a time to waste it .. and don't cry over what he missed ? No tears ? no patience in days and years ?
Is it okey for anybody in the world , to hurt who surround you ?
That is human people , with their torture to each other , they are okey and fine !!
…w la dmou3 wala Sabr 2ayaam u sneen
ولا دموع ولا صبر أيام وسنين
فى الدنيا دى كده بني أدمين
you know the most that i didn't take from the one i love
not even a tender word you know the most
i didn't live with the one i love not even a moment here
he didn't even say "i love you" to her ,he didn't call here "baby"
and she was pascient,and sacrifying,you know why?do you know who is she?
is there anywone who loves someone that hurts him this way
and who's satisfied about sacrifycing his life ,doesn anyone has the time
to waste like this and who doesn't cry about the past
no tears no pascience of days and years
does anyone take his injury for granted like this oh humain being?
they got satisfied and confortable with their tortures
without you,i'm a night without moon
a ship without sails , plants that need water
a step without a road ,a song without lyrics,life without a body
a castle that were filled with awaked hearts
and in a moment a heart were broken like a diamond in your hands
you left it ,and it became a stone
i'm like that without you ,without you i'm
missing without meeting a tear without eyes
uncurable injuries ,in your existence there is security
in your absence there is danger,without you i'm
a step without a road ,a song without lyrics,life without a body

you left it ,and it became a stone
i'm like that without you ,without you i'm
missing without meeting a tear without eyes
uncurable injuries ,in your existence there is security
in your absence there is danger,without you i'm
without my love even for a minute
I announced it to you and you should know
Bring me a hand shake(let me meet him)
or even a glance from his eyes(let me see him)
Oh.. If you knew what shape I am in
without him ,but how would you know?
Do you know how much he means to me?
He means the world to me(in my eyes)
And the most precious of all men
is the shoulder I cry on (comforter)
Yet I see him every where
I even think of him when I am asleep and awake
Close by close by close by
In a time(era) where true love seized to exist
Why did you take my love
Do you know how much he means to me?
He means the world to me(in my eyes)
And the most precious of all men
is the shoulder I cry on (comforter)
من غير حبيبي و لو دقيقه
song's name: my years laughed with me
when my eyes saw my lover
the dream that I lived in my nights
in my mind and I cannot forget
All that love is because of me
It feels (like living in) another world

and I say (to myself) that this melancholy is my destiny
and my heart has been satisfied
And I've been waiting and (finally) got you my lover
Where were all of this for my heart
every dream that I've asked for and craved for
and have been living with (each one of) them
My heart is melted because of his love and that's it

and I lived my beautiful nights
and I say (to myself) that this melancholy is my destiny\
and my heart has been satisfied

don't worth a minute, I live it in your arms

مقدرش اقول احساسى كان لعبه فـايديك
عشان احساسى هو اللى كان هيموت عليك
مقدرتش اشوف احلامى قصادى و ملمسهاش
وقلبى كان هيضيع لو سابك سيبته عااش
وقبل ما امشى احب اقولك مش هنسااااك
ولا عمرى هنسى الدنيا اللى انا عشتها وياااك

كان قلبى عارف ان في حد فحياتك
بس غصب عنه داب و اتشد ليييك

I miss my love, he's my heart's soul, my life and my being
And I say: Tomorrow he'll come and dissolve all my sadness
Who else but him could heal me and who in this world could take his place?
And who else could protect me from myself? And who has a heart like his and tenderness like his?
When he goes away and forgets me, why does my confusion and deprivation increase
And I remain alone, standing in my place. I can't come nor go
Why haven't my eyes tasted sleep? Why do I stay up everyday?

And I remain alone, standing in my place. I can't come nor go

واحشني حبيبي روح قلبي دة هو عمري و كياني
و أقول بكرة دة هايجيني يدوب كل أحزاني
و مين غيرة يداويني و مين في الدنيا دي مكانة
و مين من نفسي يحميني و مين في قلبوا و حنانوا
لما يغيب عني و ينساني لية بتزيد حيرتي و حرماني
و ابقا لوحدي و اقفة مكاني لا عارفة أروح و لا عارفة أجي
عينيا لية ما داقتش نوم سهرانة لية أنا كل يوم
و أقول حبيبي بكره هيجي إمتي حبيبي تاني هتيجي
لما يغيب عني و ينساني لية بتزيد حيرتي و حرماني
و ابقا لوحدي و اقفة مكاني لا عارفة أروح و لا عارفة أجي
